New Records: Michael Bracewell will lead the New Zealand team.
Imad Wasim and Mohammed Amir are back on the national team for Pakistan vs. New Zealand T20I series.
Haris Rauf has missed a berth due to injury.
Key Match Events: The series started on April 18, 2024, with the second match scheduled for April 20, 2024.
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand will be competing with a second-string squad.
Pakistan dominated the visitors in ODIs earlier this year.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pakistan vs. New Zealand T20I series will be streamed live in India on FanCode app.
The schedule includes matches on April 18, 20, 21, 25, and 27, 2024.
Others: The BlackCaps arrived in Rawalpindi on April 14, 2024, to play the first three matches of the series.
